description: In the heart of Nolita, you will in the middle of the best restaurants, bars, and shopping in downtown Manhattan.  You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space, the neighborhood, and the culture. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.
name: 1 BR with outdoor space in the heart of Nolita
review: I have stayed in many airbnb apartments in NYC and have never met a host as helpful, attentive and trusting as Margaux. Her lovely apartment is perfectly located in the heart of Nolita, my favorite area in Manhattan. To make my stay even more enjoyable, I mistakingly left a valuable item in her apartment and she was so helpful and willing to return it to me speedily. You'd be crazy not to stay here. Thanks again for a wonderful stay, Margaux!
